person::harmony korine.name: Harmony Korine
person::harmony korine.bio: Renowned filmmaker and artist (Kids, Spring Breakers, Aggro Dr1ft). Founder of EDGLRD, a technology-design collective.

person::bryn mooser.name: Bryn Mooser
person::bryn mooser.bio: Founder ASTERIA, Co-Founder MOONVALLEY and XTR, DOCUMENTARY+, RYOT.

traditional::xtr.name: XTR
traditional::xtr.bio: Documentary production company founded by Bryn Mooser in 2019. 80+ docs produced/financed. Launched Documentary+ streaming platform (2021). Notable: Ascension (Oscar-nom), 76 Days (Emmy/Peabody), They Call Me Magic (Apple TV+).

traditional::ryot.name: RYOT
traditional::ryot.bio: Immersive media company co-founded by Bryn Mooser in 2012. Pioneer in VR journalism — first to film VR in a war zone (Syria) and natural disaster (Nepal). Acquired by AOL/Verizon for ~$10-15M in 2016. Produced 200+ immersive and linear films.

person::nik kleverov.name: Nik Kleverov
person::nik kleverov.bio: AI Specialist, Creative Director, and Entrepreneur. Chief Creative Officer of Native Foreign.

traditional::digital kitchen.name: Digital Kitchen
traditional::digital kitchen.bio: Creative production company founded in Seattle (1995) by Paul Matthaeus. 3x Emmy-winning main title designs: Dexter (2007), Six Feet Under (2002), Godfather of Harlem (2020). Also created True Blood, Nip/Tuck, Narcos, Yellowjackets titles.

traditional::yu+co.name: yU+co
traditional::yu+co.bio: Design studio founded by Garson Yu in 1998. Specializes in film/TV title sequences. 100+ feature film titles including 300, Watchmen, Life of Pi, Crazy Rich Asians. Emmy winner for title design.

person::ryan staake.name: Ryan Staake
person::ryan staake.bio: Founder of Pomp & Clout, an innovative creative production company. Former designer on Apple's Human Interface Team.

person::joe staples.name: Joe Staples
person::joe staples.bio: Founding Partner & CCO at Mother LA. Previous Executive Creative Director at Wieden + Kennedy.

person::peter ravailhe.name: Peter Ravailhe
person::peter ravailhe.bio: Founding Partner & CEO at Mother LA. Previously Head of Sports at TBWA\Chiat\Day.

traditional::tbwa\\chiat\\day.name: TBWA\Chiat\Day
traditional::tbwa\\chiat\\day.bio: Iconic ad agency. Created Apple "1984" Super Bowl commercial (directed by Ridley Scott) and "Think Different" campaign. Nissan agency of record for 37 years. Part of Omnicom Group.

agency::droga5.name: Droga5
agency::droga5.bio: Award-winning creative agency founded by David Droga in 2006. Part of Accenture Song since 2019. Known for IHOP "IHOb", NYT "The Truth Is Worth It", Coinbase QR Super Bowl ad, and UNICEF Tap Project.

agency::tbwa\\media arts lab.name: TBWA\Media Arts Lab
agency::tbwa\\media arts lab.bio: Apple's dedicated external ad agency. Created and runs all "Shot on iPhone" campaigns since 2014. Part of TBWA Worldwide / Omnicom. Notable: Michel Gondry's "Detour" (2017), Dua Lipa tour campaign (2025).

person::simon dolsten.name: Simon Dolsten
person::simon dolsten.bio: Founder of Dolsten & Co. Multi-EMMY-winning creative director. World's most-awarded creative director by The One Show & ADC. Previously at FCB New York, Johannes Leonardo, Publicis. 37 Cannes Lions, 73 One Show Pencils.

person::jason zada.name: Jason Zada
person::jason zada.bio: Founder & CCO of Secret Level. Creator of "Take This Lollipop" (viral interactive horror). Director of "The Forest" (2016). Co-founded Evolution Bureau (EVB), acquired by Omnicom. Creator of "Elf Yourself" for OfficeMax.

person::eric shamlin.name: Eric Shamlin
person::eric shamlin.bio: CEO of Secret Level. Multiple Emmy, Peabody & Cannes Lion winner. Previously at Apple (Program Director), Omnicom, Entertainment One, Media.Monks (SVP Head of Growth). Chairs Emmy AI Task Force. Innovation Chair, Producers Guild.

person::caleb ward.name: Caleb Ward
person::caleb ward.bio: Co-Founder & CEO of Curious Refuge, the world's first online home for AI storytellers. Creator of viral "Star Wars by Wes Anderson" and "Lord of the Rings by Wes Anderson" AI films. Students in 109+ countries.

person::david droga.name: David Droga
person::david droga.bio: Founder of Droga5. Youngest-ever ECD at Saatchi & Saatchi (age 27). Named Global Chairman of Accenture Song. Named Cannes Lions Creative Person of the Decade (2020). Born in Australia.

person::garson yu.name: Garson Yu
person::garson yu.bio: Founder & Creative Director of yU+co. Previously at R/GA and co-creative director at Imaginary Forces with Kyle Cooper. Title sequences for Spielberg, Ang Lee, Ridley Scott. Emmy Award winner.

agency::arc creative.bio: Creative studio specialized in VFX, production, gaming, design, and color. Blends traditional high-end production with innovative digital craft. Clients include Apple Watch, YouTube TV, Harry Styles, Dove.
agency::arc creative.name: Arc Creative

person::anastasia von rahl.name: Anastasia Von Rahl
person::anastasia von rahl.bio: Managing Director, LA at Arc Creative.

agency::private island.bio: Studio paradise focused on disruptive advertising, animation, and AI-generated filmmaking. Known for hallucinogenic AI visuals. Clients include Nike, Lego, Ikea, EA Sports, Adobe, Pokemon.
agency::private island.name: Private Island

person::chris boyle.name: Chris Boyle
person::chris boyle.bio: Co-founder and Director at Private Island. Pioneer in AI-generated commercial filmmaking.

person::helen power.name: Helen Power
person::helen power.bio: Co-founder and Executive Producer at Private Island.

agency::promise ai.bio: GenAI-first entertainment studio creating films, series, and storytelling powered by AI tools. Founded by ex-YouTube/Fullscreen execs. Google-backed but limited output after a year.
agency::promise ai.name: Promise AI

person::george strompolos.name: George Strompolos
person::george strompolos.bio: Founder of Promise AI. Previously founded Fullscreen (YouTube MCN).

person::jamie byrne.name: Jamie Byrne
person::jamie byrne.bio: Founder of Promise AI. Former YouTube executive.

agency::bottom line ai.bio: Paris-based studio focused on AI filmmaking. Provides concept art, animatics, previsualization, and full production using generative models. Notable for spec ads including Volvo.
agency::bottom line ai.name: Bottom Line AI

agency::metaphysic.ai.bio: Famous for hyperrealistic deepfakes and digital identities. Created DeepTomCruise viral TikToks and AGT Elvis deepfake. Provided de-aging tech for Tom Hanks in 'Here'. Domain now inactive - founder Tom Graham pivoting to Brahma AI.
agency::metaphysic.ai.name: Metaphysic.ai

person::tom graham.name: Tom Graham
person::tom graham.bio: CEO and Founder of Metaphysic.ai. TIME100 Most Influential Companies 2023. Pivoting to Brahma AI.

person::chris ume.name: Chris Ume
person::chris ume.bio: Co-founder of Metaphysic.ai. Renowned deepfake artist behind DeepTomCruise.

person::neil ghaznavi.bio: Co-Founder and VFX/VP Supervisor at Arc Creative. Previously at The Mill.
person::neil ghaznavi.name: Neil Ghaznavi

person::tim crean.bio: Founding Member and Creative Leader at Arc Creative, New York office. Previously at The Mill.
person::tim crean.name: Tim Crean

traditional::the mill.bio: Legendary VFX and creative technology studio. Multiple Arc Creative founders are alumni.
traditional::the mill.name: The Mill

agency::voriq.bio: Boutique studio specializing in high-end AI content for advertising, music videos, and short films. Delivers TVC-quality AI ads for major global brands.
agency::voriq.name: VORIQ

agency::genre.ai.bio: AI-native creative agency focused on viral, shareable generative AI campaigns for social media and performance marketing. 275M+ views on AI content.
agency::genre.ai.name: Genre.ai

person::pj accetturo.bio: CEO of Genre.ai. Prominent figure in AI creative space, known for viral AI work for Google, Popeyes, Qatar Airways.
person::pj accetturo.name: PJ Accetturo

agency::351 studio.bio: Specialized AI video production agency focused on cinematic generative AI. Premium, high-production-value commercials and branded films.
agency::351 studio.name: 351 Studio

agency::the gardening club.bio: AI-exclusive production collective and sister company to The Sweetshop. Experimenting with Sora, Runway, Kling. Behind McDonald's Netherlands AI Christmas ad.
agency::the gardening club.name: The Gardening Club

traditional::the sweetshop.bio: Major production house. Parent company of The Gardening Club.
traditional::the sweetshop.name: The Sweetshop

agency::gennie studio.bio: Entertainment-focused AI studio specializing in AI reenactments and unscripted storytelling. Pushing AI into TV shows and character-driven entertainment.
agency::gennie studio.name: Gennie Studio

person::max einhorn.bio: Founder of Gennie Studio. Former Head of Content at Crypt TV.
person::max einhorn.name: Max Einhorn

agency::lava media.bio: Boutique creative shop using AI-driven video production for Fortune 500 clients (Reebok, Vivo). Delivers high-quality VFX and commercials with lean teams.
agency::lava media.name: LAVA Media
